name: i sincerely hate you
description:
I Sincerely Hate You

The sound is unfinished!!!!!!!

I created this game as a way to cope with my experiences with someone I used to know.  It has 4 endings but only 2 of them really matter. 

I wanted to post this game (although unfinished) because I worked hard on it and put effort into it. It means a lot to me emotionally.
